title: HoReCa
description: Hotels, restaurants, laundries and other hospitality venues use ozonation to create a comfortable environment, eliminate odors and maintain high hygiene standards.

hotels.title: Hotels
hotels.content:
Hotel room ozonation is a modern method for quick disinfection and odor removal. Ozone effectively destroys bacteria, viruses, mold, fungi and parasitic protozoa on all surfaces.

An air ozonator allows full treatment of a room after cleaning when guests change. Typically 30–60 minutes of treatment is enough. The gas penetrates all crevices and corners, disinfecting textiles, furniture and décor.

After treatment, ozone decomposes to oxygen without toxic byproducts. The air feels "fresh" without air fresheners or masking agents. Complete removal of tobacco, sweat, musty and damp odors.

Treatment does not require staff after the ozonator is switched on. Modern units have weekly timers for automation.
benefits: Complete removal of tobacco and sweat odors
Disinfection of all surfaces without chemicals

restaurants.title: Restaurants and cafes
restaurants.shortDesc: Removal of kitchen and tobacco odors
restaurants.heroDesc: Removal of kitchen, tobacco and hookah odors. Fresh air improves guest comfort and appetite.
restaurants.content:
Restaurant business is about atmosphere. The smell of a smoky room, stale food or kitchen grease can put off even loyal customers. Research shows that air quality directly affects subconscious perception of service.

Smell is so closely tied to the subconscious that people may not realize why they feel comfortable or not in a venue. They simply say "liked it" or "didn't like it." That impression determines whether they return.

Ozonation addresses this radically — not masking odors with fragrances but destroying them at the molecular level. Regular ozonation of premises during off-hours significantly reduces unpleasant odors.

Ozone is a gas and a strong oxidizer. It penetrates hard-to-reach areas, material structure and pores where odor sources are sorbed, and oxidizes odor molecules to water and carbon dioxide.
problems: Tobacco and hookah odor — penetrates furniture, curtains, upholstery
Kitchen odors — grease, spices, fish, garlic
Damp and mold — especially in basements
Ventilation odor — grease buildup in ducts
Restroom odors — enter the hall with poor ventilation
Bacteria and mold — sources of unpleasant odors

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.desc: Neutralization of grease in ventilation and frying odors.

toilets.desc: Complete odor removal and bacteria destruction.

laundries.title: Commercial laundries
laundries.heroDesc: Cold-water washing with full disinfection. Up to 70% savings on energy and chemicals.
laundries.content:
Water ozonation in laundries is an advanced technology that significantly reduces detergent, hot water and energy use, and extends linen life and shortens wash time. Ozone dissolves in water and replaces part of the chemicals.

This is a fundamental change in washing: you replace harsh chemistry with something that works much better. So much better that water and time use can also be reduced.

Ozone is a strong oxidizer. With a small amount of alkali, cold water and detergent you can achieve cleaning and brightness equal to or better than chlorine and hot water.

The colder the water, the more stable ozone is and the longer it works. Above 95°C ozone loses effectiveness due to faster decay.
benefits: Treatment of delicate items without damage

ozoneClosets.title: Ozone cabinets for dry cleaners
ozoneClosets.desc: Dry cleaners use ozone cabinets — sealed chambers filled with high-concentration ozone. As a gas, ozone penetrates the densest fabrics and hard-to-reach areas.
features: Treatment of delicate items: theatrical costumes, vintage, fur coats, leather jackets
Odor removal: fire smoke, tobacco, biological odors, pet odors
Disinfection: destroys bacteria, viruses and fungal spores
Monetization: sold as VIP service at minimal cost

tobacco-hookah.title: Hookah lounges and tobacco
tobacco-hookah.heroDesc: Chemical removal of ingrained smoke odor. Not masking — full neutralization in 60–120 minutes.
tobacco-hookah.content:
Ingrained, aged cigarette and hookah odor can put off visitors. Even in hookah lounges where guests like fresh hookah aroma, there is a problem: when smoke soaks into furniture and upholstery, aromatic additives evaporate quickly, leaving only unpleasant smoke and tar odor.

Ozonation is the only effective method for chemically removing such odors rather than masking them with fragrances. Ozone oxidizes odor molecules to water and carbon dioxide or to odorless oxidation products.

Tobacco and hookah smoke contain tars that penetrate porous materials: fabrics, wood, upholstery, ceiling tiles, carpets. Over time these substances accumulate and create a persistent unpleasant odor.

Regular ozonation during off-hours keeps the air fresh. With correct start and end times, ozone dissipates before staff arrive.
odorSources: Textiles (curtains, upholstery, cushions) — main odor reservoir

secondhand.title: Secondhand stores
secondhand.heroDesc: Removal of characteristic clothing odor. Customer comfort and higher sales.
secondhand.content:
The characteristic odor of clothing in secondhand stores comes from mandatory disinfection. Before sale, items are treated with formaldehyde or methyl bromide gas to kill viruses and bacteria. The disinfectants dissipate by the time clothes reach the shelves, but the characteristic smell remains.

This odor is the main retail problem in secondhand. It fills the whole store and triggers unpleasant associations with worn clothing. Some customers spend less time in the store because of discomfort.

Odor affects perceived product quality. Customers subconsciously pay less for items with an unpleasant smell, even if they are in excellent condition.

Regular clothing ozonation effectively removes the odor and freshens the store air. Ozonation is done during off-hours for 1–3 hours. The gas penetrates all crevices and corners, treating all merchandise.
benefits: Treatment of all merchandise at once
advantages: Higher product appeal — items perceived as better quality
Destruction of dust mites — important for allergy sufferers
Mold removal — relevant for basement premises
